They met twice a week during Greenspan's chairmanship, and clearly are very active now. They are intent on suppressing the price of Gold, and in currency intervention. Message.Title: Walmart is doing the same thing as Amazon
Message.Msg: One of the things that Amazon has been doing for a long time is to advertise items on their website, but have them shipped directly from the seller. This saves Amazon the cost of having to stock the item. It's a pretty smart move. While looking to buy a wallet, I found that Walmart is now doing the same thing. You can now basically buy the exact same item on the Walmart website for the same price as on Amazon. This will probably end up taking sales from Amazon.
